function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Citizens under 20 likely to carry the virus without symptoms and infect others","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Regular testing and strict adherence to distancing measures","Technologies":"Testing for virus detection, contact tracing apps","People":"Citizens under 20, others in close contact","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, government"},{"Description":"Concerns about psychological and emotional wellbeing of restricted individuals","Impact":"Negative mental health effects","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, access to online therapy","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"Restricted individuals, families, communities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Emotional, psychological, sociological consequences and serious economic implications","Impact":"Decreased mental wellbeing, social unrest, economic hardship","Mitigation":"Community support initiatives, economic relief programs, mental health interventions","Technologies":"Social support platforms, financial aid systems","People":"Community members, individuals, businesses","Owner":"Government, community organizations"}]}
